search_results.snippet: Quinceaera (Spanish pronunciation: [kinseaea]; feminine form of "fifteen-year-old"), also called fiesta de quince aos, fiesta de quinceaera, quince aos, quinceaero or simply quince, is a celebration of a girl's fifteenth birthday with cultural roots of Latin America but celebrated throughout the Americas.
